mcq.statement: How can a person go about renewing his insurance and initiating the process of claims and compensation?

options.a: Application must be lodged at OPF
options.b: Application must be lodged with DG emigration
options.c: Insurance can be renewed after two years at relevant Proctorate of Emigrant (PE) office or embassy of the host country
options.d: It can be done at bureau emigrant and Overseas Employment
